Prerequisite: Halfling, second chance racial power

Benefit: When you use the halfling second chance power, the attacker takes a -2 penalty to the new attack roll.

Revision (7/28/2008)

Replace Benefits text with "When you use the second chance power, the attacker takes a -2 penalty to the new attack roll."

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 195.
